labels.name: awaiting-release
labels.description: Issues where the fix/feature has been merged and is awaiting a release.

labels.name: beginner
labels.description: Less complex issues which would be good first issues to work on.

labels.name: blocked
labels.description: Issues blocked on other issues.

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Confirmed bugs or reports that are very likely to be bugs.

labels.name: critical-priority
labels.description: Should be addressed with the highest priority.

labels.name: discussion
labels.description: Issue that is having/needs discussion.

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: Issues which are duplicates of other issues, i.e. they have been reported before.

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: Feature requests.

labels.name: feedback
labels.description: General feedback more than bug reports or feature requests.

labels.name: help-wanted
labels.description: The ATLauncher team would appreciate help from the community in resolving these issues.

labels.name: high-priority
labels.description: High priority to be addressed.

labels.name: invalid
labels.description: Issues which aren't valid (e.g. user errors).

labels.name: known-workaround
labels.description: Issues which have a known workaround.

labels.name: low-priority
labels.description: Low priority to be addressed.

labels.name: more-information-needed
labels.description: More information needs to be collected about these problems or feature requests.

labels.name: needs-review
labels.description: Pull requests which need code review, and approval from maintainers or ATLauncher team.

labels.name: needs-testing
labels.description: Pull requests which need manual testing.

labels.name: question
labels.description: Questions more than bug reports or feature requests (e.g. how do I do X).

labels.name: ready-to-merge
labels.description: Pull requests which have been reviewed and are ready to merge.

labels.name: requires-changes
labels.description: Pull requests which need to be updated based on review comments and then reviewed again.

labels.name: roadmap-long-term
labels.description: Items on the roadmap in the long term (6-12 months).

labels.name: roadmap-medium-term
labels.description: Items on the roadmap in the medium term (3-6 months).

labels.name: roadmap-short-term
labels.description: Items on the roadmap in the short term (1 month).

labels.name: support
labels.description: User has asked for support, but support is not given via issues

labels.name: triage-help-needed
labels.description: Help is needed to triage the issue.

labels.name: under-review
labels.description: Pull requests being reviewed by maintainers and/or ATLauncher team.

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: The ATLauncher team has decided not to fix these issues for now for some reason.

labels.name: work-in-progress
labels.description: Pull requests which are still being worked on, more changes will follow.

labels.name: wrong-repo
labels.description: Issues reported on the wrong repository.
